revised_title: Royal Society Proceedings: Magnetic Instrument Comparison and New Lycopodiaceous Cones
tldr: This article discusses a comparison of magnetic instruments at Kew Observatory with the standard French instruments at Parc Saint-Maur. It also introduces a new genus of Lycopodiaceous cones from the Coal-measures called Spencerites. The author, C. S. Sherrington, collaborates with Dr. E. H. Hearing on this research.
